channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Stranger Things’ Matt Duffer Says He Shouldn’t Have Answered Finale Questions
item.description: After a series of poor answers about the finale of Stranger Things, co-showrunner Matt Duffer says he probably shouldn't have talked about them at all...

item.title: While worker bonuses decrease, pay transparency is on the rise in 2026
item.description: Less than 40% of employees received a bonus last year, down from 44% in 2021, according to new data from ADP.

item.title: ‘The Beast In Me’ Is About To Set A Netflix Top 10 Record
item.description: The Beast in Me is inching toward what would be a current record on Netflix's top 10 list if it can hold on a few more days.

item.title: Chevron stock is spiking after the U.S. raid on Venezuela
item.description: The price of U.S. crude oil gained 1% after U.S. forces captured Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro in a weekend raid.

item.title: If entry-level jobs disappear, who becomes a CEO?
